price: Daabi, saa Da no yεde ntwaremu bɛtware wͻn ne wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn ntεm.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
